clearscope static double '''BobSin'''(double fb)
== Usage == Can be used to calculate a bobbing offset that matches Actors with FLOATBOB.
=== Parameters === *''fb'' - counter to track which phase the bob is in
=== Return value === Returns the bob offset.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
== [[ZScript]] definition == {{ZScriptDefinitionNote|actors/actor.zs#L492}} <syntaxhighlight lang="csharp"> clearscope static double BobSin(double fb) { return sin(fb * (180./32)) * 8; } </syntaxhighlight>
